result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam J Lampkin

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on December 1, 2022 at 10:50 am.

8:35 a.m.
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 22CF446 AND 22CF960

State appears by ADA Hannah Runde; Defendant appears in person in custody from the MCJ, with Attorney Julianne Lennon.

Date and time set for a Motion Hearing. VRCW.

ADA Runde makes statement regarding reason for follow up hearing.
COURT addresses parties.
ADA Runde make statement - an order is needed to provide CI. Makes statement regarding confidential source.
Atty Lennon states she will draft an Order. Makes further statements regarding the confidential source. Requests something in writing regarding confidential source.
COURT notes it was put on the record today regarding the confidential source.
Parties are in agreement with it being on the record. 

ADJ: 8:38 a.m.

State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence; Attorney Lennon appears in person
DATES:
Keep dates on

Pre-trial Conference held
Future dates are set
Pre-trial conference on September 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Includes 22CF446 and 22CF960
ADA Hannah Boeck appears in person; Attorney Lennon appears in person
DATES: 
PTC w/JA: 9/27/22 at 1:30 pm

Pre-trial conference on September 7, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Motion hearing on October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

8:36 a.m.
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 22CF446 and 22CF960

State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck; Defendant appears in person, in custody from the MCJ, with Attorney Julianne Lennon.

Date and time set for a Motion Hearing (Reveal Identity of CI No. 3243 and Source) on 22CF446. Case 22CF960 tracking. VRCW.

ADA Boeck does not object to the defense's motion. 
OTR: 8:36 a.m.
BOTR: 8:37 a.m.
COURT addresses State and time table.
ADA Boeck states within the next 3 weeks.
Atty Lennon makes statement. 
ADA Boeck was just referring to CI.
Atty Lennon makes further statements regarding Confidential Source.
ADA Boeck makes statement regarding Confidential Source.
COURT adjourns the motion for three weeks. 

OTR: 8:40 a.m.
BOTR: 8:46 a.m.

COURT recites MH date and time. 

NEXT DATE>>
PTC - 9/7/22 at 9:10 a.m. (previously calendared)
MH (Motion to Reveal CI and CI Source) - 10/7/22 at 8:30 a.m. (15 mins)

records.addlTxt:
Motion hearing on August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 7, 2022 at 09:10 am.

Clerk:  Micki. 
Case called: 9:14 a.m.   
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall for ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears in custody w/Attorney Julianne Lennon.
Date and time set for preliminary hearing.

Roy Umlauf sworn and testifies and identifies defendant.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Information will be e-filed; Reading Waived; R/J. 
Plea >> NOT GUILTY. 

Next Hearing >> 
Previously Calendared: JPTC - 8/25/22 at 8:30 a.m.

cc: Branch 6.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 10:19 am. 
State of Wisconsin appears by ADA Lacey Coonen.  Defendant appears from MCJ, pro se.

Date and Time set for Review of Counsel.  VRCW. 

Court directs defendant to contact SPD.  Defendant has Attorney Julianne Lennon on his other cases. 

Hearings to remain on the calendar. 
Adj: 10:20 am.

Review hearing on August 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary Hearing on August 15, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Review hearing on August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

No contact with victim(s): N.L. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession of drug paraphernalia.

Clerk Micki. 
Case called: 2:06 p.m.

State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.  Defendant appears via Zoom video from the MCJ, with Attorney Peter Vu and Attorney Krista Cannon.

Attorney Peter Vu notes that the defendant refused to see SPD staff today. 

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): N.L.
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 


Dates:
RH - 8/10/22 at 10:00 a.m. 
PH - 8/15/22 at 9:10 a.m.
MH - 8/25/22 at 8:30 a.m.

Branch 6.

ADJ: 2:10 p.m.
